overview: Eva Kovaks is the beautiful and mysterious seductress who is heading an international network of gorgeous women dealing in sexual blackmail and political payoff. Her targets are the international bigwigs whose decisions always shaft the world. Eva really doesn't like the men because she feels that "they think with their cocks and fuck anything that moves"!! She wants to expose these high powered members of the United Nations Security Council and their chauvinistic shenanigans.
title: Blonde Velvet
